dtliExcerpt: Mr. Kittles breathes raucously funny life into his character. He all but glows with recollected pleasure as he recounts anecdotes from his youth… Mr. Kittles is joined by just two actors, Brittany Inge and Stori Ayers, who play multiple roles with delightful aplomb"

"It may take a while for audiences to tune in to the play’s rollicking rhythms."
